subIssue.title: Implement API endpoints and controllers
subIssue.body:
## Description
Create controllers and endpoints for the Web API to handle HTTP requests.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create a base controller class with common functionality
- [ ] Implement CRUD controllers for main resources
- [ ] Add appropriate routing attributes
- [ ] Implement proper HTTP status code responses
- [ ] Document endpoints using XML comments for Swagger/OpenAPI

## Acceptance Criteria
- Controllers properly handle GET, POST, PUT, DELETE operations
- Routes follow RESTful principles
- Appropriate HTTP status codes are returned
- Controller methods have XML documentation
